alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN BAYFIELD AND NORTHERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Stoney Point, to 7 miles east of Wisconsin Point, to near Oliver, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oulu around 640 PM CDT. Maple, Poplar, Port Wing and Herbster around 645 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
